quotes.text: This is the real secret of life - to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now. And instead of calling it work, realize it is play.
If you want to change the world, start with the next person who comes to you in need
Awareness is the greatest agent for change
Today, you can decide to walk in freedom. You can choose to walk differently. You can walk as a free person, enjoying every step.
No snowflake ever falls in the wrong place
When the task is done beforehand, then it is easy
